label: 色紙形
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Shikishigata were sometimes pasted or drawn on the surfaces of folding screens and sliding doors, where they served a purpose similar to shikishi (p. 301). [色紙]
